EmailTemplate.subject: Urgent Action Needed: MSP Avionics/Mechanical Components Billing coming soon.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Customer,
As notified previously your MSP Avionics and/or Mechanical Components Contract 4400XXXXX anniversary date is approaching and your annual billing invoice will be processed on XX.XX.20XX.
If you have not started the below steps please do so at this time.
Advise if aircraft is sold or otherwise not flying Confirm any changes to your predicted flight hours Resolve any questions or concerns related to contract coverage Review new features/options available for each plan Contact operator to arrange for payment If helpful to your process, provide PO to Honeywell
If there are any issues with the annual billing, please let us know prior to the anniversary date
Thank you for doing business with us, your case tracking number for this renewal is provided above. You may reply to this email - please leave the reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
To access our Portal and view contracts click on any of these options: Register, Reset Password, Tool Access.
Kind regards,
__________________Q Honeywell
MSP Avionics & Mechanical Contract Administration MSPAvionics@honeywell.com
